website_summaries.verdict: The Skechers Larson – Almelo’s mature aesthetic, versatile design, and comfortable feel make it a shoe favored by people who like comfort and love a casually sharp outfit. It marries a sporty and sophisticated style flawlessly. Apart from the shoe’s adequate comfort and tasteful design, it is also a budget-friendly pair, which makes the shoe worth the try.
pros: The majority of the reviewers said that the Skechers Larson – Almelo is very comfortable, perfect to wear all day
The shoe fits perfectly and is true to size, according to a number of purchasers
Many reviewers refer to this shoe as their “go-to” pair because it goes with almost all of their casual outfits
The shoe is stylish according to several wearers
The Skechers Larson – Almelo is offered at a budget-friendly price
It is available in different colorways
A handful of shoe users appreciate the added comfort the Air Cooled Memory Foam provides
Buyers agree that the Larson – Almelo is a purchase with a good value for money
Some purchasers loved the shoe so much so they bought the same shoe in different colors
cons: A few shoe users noticed that it does not have arch support

customer_reviews.title: Sole came unglued.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased July 2017 to begin school year in Sept. I am a teacher who stands most of the day. Shoes were comfortable, good looking....that's the good part. This week, Feb. 5, 2018 after wearing less than 5 months Monday-Friday the sole of one of the shoes came unglue. Just flapping up/down. Any suggestions. Like the shoes but they should have lasted longer than this.
customer_reviews.author: Dora Pasour

customer_reviews.title: OOPS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair of non skid Skechers for my son. He works in a kitchen. They were made well and worked for him. So I purchased a regular pair for myself and what a difference. They are very cheaply made. I should have known better because the price was lower than usual. In all fairness you have make sure you are buying the right model to get a good shoe. I did not.
customer_reviews.author: Jack of all trades

customer_reviews.title: Look good - feel good!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but a little on the small side. I normally wear a 10.5-11 size shoe. Got these in 11, and they are tight- but wearing in nicely. Never disappointed with Skechers shoes. They always hold up and look great. Using these for work in a business casual atmosphere and get compliments everyday. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen and Brian

customer_reviews.title: They don’t last
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of walking and the sole wears out very quickly, as they’re just a foam-like material, not rubber. I was only able to get 6 months out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Not leather.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looked great before and after arriving, but what I missed was that it is not leather! Almost entirely synthetic material. I don't like plastic shoes. They went back and replaced with leather Skechers.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: Best Skecher tennis shoes I have ever bought. The picture doesn't do them justice, they are very streamlined and sharp looking. I get compliments on them all the time. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A consistent shoe that I can buy online.
customer_reviews.text: I like the Skechers because they have no arch support. They have memory foam instead. This way I know it won't feel like a rock is in my shoe and I can buy them online, they will fit and be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Brownm279

customer_reviews.title: Nice, comfortable shoes.  Can't go wrong with Skechers!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this style of Skechers after my last style didn't work out. This style and fit was perfect and now I am loving life again. You cannot go wrong with Skechers for affordable, quality, comfortable shoes. They are very, very nice shoes.
customer_reviews.author: mario williams

customer_reviews.title: Son loved it.
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old son loved it. I got size 8 1/2 and he said it fits right and comfy, in fact this was supposed to be another spare for school shoes but he is wearing it right away. Hopefully it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Kcasiwa of Fremont

customer_reviews.title: It's in the name.
customer_reviews.text: Another pair of Skechers that won't disappoint me. I'm wearing them right now with a long work day in front of me on a fast paced floor where dress is business casual. On my feet the third or fourth time since buying them and they're broken in like I've had them a year. Completely comfortable, perfect fit. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but pretty narrow. I have to leave laces pretty loose ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are made well, but pretty narrow. I have to leave laces pretty loose to wear comfortably. They are okay, but I would have passed on them if I had been able to try them on first. Just made narrow
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and I really like the "gel" pad
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and I really like the "gel" pad. Very comfortable, but they do look a bit like a bowling shoe. These are not for warm weather as they are not vented. They are sized accurately.
customer_reviews.author: W. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: First Sketchers for me.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is excellent. Soft sole so we'll see how they hold up. Shoes look great too. Insole not removable.
customer_reviews.author: jimfrompa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking and feeling
customer_reviews.text: I returned these as they felt very cheap. The insole was not removable which I need for my orthotics. But they quality seemed rather poor.
customer_reviews.author: David M

customer_reviews.title: As expected from Skechers oxfords
customer_reviews.text: They fit great and I've never had issues with the Skechers oxfords.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Chiera

customer_reviews.title: I had a pair of Clark desert boots & love them. The memory foam inserts may U feel ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of Clark desert boots & love them. The memory foam inserts may U feel you could jump 10 feet up. LOVE 'em.
customer_reviews.author: LOU TOPASH

customer_reviews.title: but they look NICE and I'm happy overall
customer_reviews.text: It was a little uncomfortable at the beginning and took some breaking in, but they look NICE and I'm happy overall!
customer_reviews.author: Giorgi Maghlakelidze

customer_reviews.title: I'm a very happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like about a brand of shoes that are consistently sized right, are very comfortable, and are stylish as well. I'm a very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Pete B

customer_reviews.title: Really like the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Really like the shoes. Extremely comfortable. Needed a day or two to break them in. These were my primary shoes for a week long trip to Greece and have no complaints. Look good with khakis or jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory K. Westberg

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, fits as expected and Sketchers is the ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, fits as expected and Sketchers is the only shoe that I order online. Size is has always been correct.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Mans

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than normal.
customer_reviews.text: These seemed smaller than normal for a size 11. I ordered a different style of Skechers same size and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: starstruck

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Comfort, good value, good-looking, bought in dark brown size 10 Regular and it fits just right,
customer_reviews.author: BelleR

customer_reviews.title: I like my shoes very much.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my shoes!. They are very comfortable, this memory foam has been the glory for my feet. I recommend this shoes
customer_reviews.author: Adolfo Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Best Oxfords
customer_reviews.text: I love Sketchers Oxford's. Looks perfect, fits perfect. Very comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Murat Gundogdu

customer_reviews.title: Relaxed fit and a lil tight fitting
customer_reviews.text: I got these in size 10. These are very comfortable. They have a slight tight fit when putting them on but other than they are stylish and are comfortable to wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: Quinton

customer_reviews.title: Bought 1 size up and could have bought exact size ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 1 size up and could have bought exact size. Wish there were more width sizes available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit well
customer_reviews.text: I'm fine, although being new my foot hurts a little, surely over time will become softer
customer_reviews.author: Mario Castro

customer_reviews.title: They were very comfortable from the minute I put them on
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace a pair of Sketchers I bought several years ago that finally wore out. They were very comfortable from the minute I put them on. A great pair of shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Volper

customer_reviews.title: The shoes fit well and are comfortable. I haven't walked a long distance yet and ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit well and are comfortable. I haven't walked a long distance yet and I hope they feel good after 4-5 miles.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered shoes same size all my shoes are But this shoes 1/4 size too big.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and heel cushion
customer_reviews.text: I was worried the color grey would be too light, but they look great. The price was even better for the Grey.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Eickhoff

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Also good with traction
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for work. I stand on my feet long periods at a time. Very comfortable. Also good with traction.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Mizak

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: No arch support, hard on the heel. Was thinking of returning them, but a paint spill ended that idea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Shoe Fits...I'm Wearing.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, good fit. Look same as pictured. Arrived one day after expected.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Lenz

customer_reviews.title: Not a genuine leather. Still looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoes. But. There is no leather at all. It is 100% synthetic material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable pair of shoes. Taupe is not the best choice...Try different color.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Seem fairly good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was a little afraid to order these shoes on line because of fit issues but these turned to fit as well as any that I have purchased at a store in the same size. I like the plain style and "goes with everything" grey color. My only question is how long will they last? The sole is "pebbled" and appears like it will wear quickly. Still, this is what I would have paid at most "discount" shoe stores so it's worth the risk.
customer_reviews.author: FredL

customer_reviews.title: ... tried on last night and its okay and feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I tried on last night and its okay and feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Garfield

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfortable Shoes at Bargain Prices
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits perfectly and I enjoyed the first pair so much I ordered a second pair [diferent color]. Second pair arrived today and enjoying same experience all over again. Great for walking and remains comfortable all day. Kudos to Skechers
customer_reviews.author: Tom Munday

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Better than I thought they would be. I'm going to buy another pair in a different color because I like them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I wear them at work. Hope they last.
customer_reviews.author: Rick H.

product_meta.title: Skechers Mens Larson Almelo Larson Almelo
